# PKPayLater

**Enumeration**

Functions for validating information the framework displays in an Apple Pay Later visual merchandising widget.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum PKPayLater
```

## Utilities

- **validate(amount:currency:)**: Checks if the framework can display Apple Pay Later visual merchandising widget information for the given amount and currency.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Checks if the framework can display Apple Pay Later visual merchandising widget information for the given amount and currency.
